entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Port Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hawkesbury Airport 06:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. High zero. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow before morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight then northeast 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
